languages.text: "Служители культов смерти всегда были на хорошем счету у многих членов Инквизиции. Если тебе не нужен телохранитель, Ордо Ксенос рассмотрит вопрос ее вербовки".
"Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."
languages.original_text: "Служители культов смерти всегда были на хорошем счету у многих членов Инквизиции. Если тебе не нужен телохранитель, Ордо Ксенос рассмотрит вопрос ее вербовки".

traits.locale_text: "The Inquisition has always looked favourably on members of death cults. If you're not in need of a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos will consider recruiting her."
"The Inquisition has always looked favourably on members of death cults. If you're not in need of a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos will consider recruiting her."
"The Inquisition has always looked favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."
"The Inquisition has always looked favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."
"Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."
"Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

languages.text: « De nombreux membres de l'Inquisition voient les cultistes de la mort d'un bon œil. Si vous n'avez pas besoin d'un garde du corps, l'Ordo Xénos saurait certainement faire bon usage de ses talents. »
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition a toujours vu les cultistes de la mort d'un bon œil. Si vous n'avez pas besoin d'un garde du corps, l'Ordo Xénos saurait certainement faire bon usage de ses talents. »

languages.text: «Muchos miembros de la Inquisición aprueban los Cultos de la Muerte. Si no necesita una guardaespaldas, tal vez la reclute el Ordo Xenos».
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

traits.locale_text: «La Inquisición siempre ha aprobado los Cultos de la Muerte. Si no necesita una guardaespaldas, tal vez la reclute el Ordo Xenos».

languages.text: “审判庭很多人都对拜死教青睐有加。如果你不需要保镖的话，异形审判庭可能会考虑把她招募走。”
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

traits.locale_text: “审判庭一直对拜死教青睐有加。如果你不需要保镖的话，异形审判庭可能会考虑把她招募走。”

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の多くは死のカルトに対して好意的でした。ボディーガードが不要なら、〈純血の団〉が代わりに彼女を採用するかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁は常に死のカルトに対して好意的でした。ボディーガードが不要なら、〈純血の団〉が代わりに彼女を採用するかもしれません」

languages.text: "Viele Mitglieder der Inquisition betrachten Todeskultisten mit Wohlwollen. Wenn Ihr keine Leibwache benötigt, rekrutiert sie vielleicht der Ordo Xenos."
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition hat Todeskultisten immer mit Wohlwollen betrachtet. Wenn Ihr keine Leibwache benötigt, so rekrutiert sie der Ordo Xenos vielleicht stattdessen."

languages.text: "Engizisyon'a dâhil niceleri, ölüm tarikatçılarına iyi gözle bakar. Korumaya ihtiyacın yoksa Zeno Nizamı, onu saflarına katabilir."
languages.original_text: "Many within the Inquisition look favourably on death cultists. If you do not need a bodyguard, the Ordo Xenos might recruit her instead."
